headline: The Walt Disney Company (DIS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Walt Disney Company on Disruptive Analytics’ Substack by Magnus Ofstad. In this article, we will summarize the bull’s thesis on DIS. The Walt Disney Company’s share was trading at $117.75 as of June 23rd. DIS’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.03 and 18.66 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. After […]

headline: Oppenheimer Increases PT on Amazon (AMZN) Stock, Maintains Outperform
summary: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) is one of the 10 AI stocks that Jim Cramer and analysts are watching. On June 20, Oppenheimer raised its price target on AMZN shares to $250 from $215 and kept an Outperform rating. The firm cited higher margins that are now more aligned with Street expectations, supported by an improved trade […]

headline: 2wai Launches Out of Stealth to Introduce the First Social App for Avatars
summary: 2wai, the HoloAvatar company, today emerged out of stealth to usher in a new era of human connection through its lifelike AI HoloAvatars and the early access launch of its social media app. Founded by entertainment industry veteran, Russell Geyser, CEO, and Disney, Hulu and Netflix star, Calum Worthy, 2wai is transforming how people interact in the age of AI with the world's most lightweight AI avatars capable of real-time conversation. Unlike other cloud-based avatar solutions, 2wai's HoloAvata
